text:
Bayern Munich: Erik ten Hag will not come
Announced at Bayern Munich, to replace Niko Kovac, who has resigned, Ajax coach Erik ten Hag announced that he will not come.
04 Nov 2019, 23:00 by Hugo Deloraine



Who will lead Bayern Munich? While several media, including serious Sky Sports Germany was the number one candidate to replace Niko Kovac as coach, after the resignation of the latter this weekend, Erik ten Hag announced in a press conference that he will stay at Ajax Amsterdam.




"I will stay at Ajax this season"




Ajax Amsterdam + 16 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

While Ajax move to Chelsea tomorrow for the fourth day of the Champions League, the Dutch coach said in a press conference: "I can confirm that I will stay at Ajax this season." One less name on the list of many contenders to join the Bayern bench.
